meta.title: BeavFlatten - Zip Flattener Tool
meta.description: Instantly flatten complex directory structures from your ZIP files. A professional tool by Stark Yuan.
title: BeavFlatten
subtitle: Instantly flatten complex directory structures from your ZIP files.
deepseek.title: Directory Flattener Tool (DeepSeek Version)
deepseek.meta.description: The DeepSeek version of the BeavFlatten tool, featuring advanced configuration options and detailed processing statistics.
deepseek.subtitle: Flatten directory structures from ZIP archives, with support for configurable exception lists.
deepseek.config.title: Configuration Options
deepseek.config.exceptionsHelp: Enter names of files or directories you don't want to exclude, separated by commas.
deepseek.fileInput.label: Select ZIP File
gemini.title: BeavFlatten (GeminiPro Version)
gemini.meta.description: The GeminiPro version of the BeavFlatten tool, featuring an intuitive drag-and-drop interface and streamlined user experience.
gemini.subtitle: Intelligent drag-and-drop upload, flatten your directory structure instantly.
gemini.upload.drag: Drag and drop the .zip file here, or
gemini.config.exclude: Enable smart exclusion (hidden files, system files, etc.)
gemini.config.exceptions: Exception List (do not exclude the following, comma-separated)
gemini.preview.title: Processed File List:

feedback.description: Scan the QR code or click the button below to submit your valuable feedback.
